entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:09 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 6.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:24 PM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 6.8°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 0.6 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle near noon. Showers beginning early this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
